Form Group

A form with a label on top of each form control.

mail_outline We'll never share your email with anyone else.
lock_open
terms and conditions
Fieldset

Group related elements in a form with a legend.

Personal Information
Form Grid

More complex forms can be built using our grid classes. Use these for form layouts that require multiple columns, varied widths, and additional alignment options.

terms and conditions
Horizontal Form

Create horizontal forms with the grid by adding the .row class to form groups and using the .col classes to specify the width of your labels and controls.

Inline forms

Use the .form-inline class to display a series of labels, form controls, and buttons on a single horizontal row. Form controls within inline forms vary slightly from their default states.

Table Form

Create horizontal forms with table layout.

Form Group Fieldset Form Grid Horizontal Form Inline forms Table Form
